header.rec_loc: in the car travelling in America on holiday
header.topics: Planning next few months; getting rid of possessions; doing too much; a theory of life.
header.activity: Car journey conversation about plans, tidying and doing too much

speaker.fls: Italian -- level unspecified; French -- level unspecified
